title: The Machine Gun Goddess I Met On the White Desert Battlefield - Novel Updates
author: XI
description:
Emily is a tomboy. She runs with a machine gun to destroy the enemy. 

I found her beautiful and I fell in love with her. We were united, but we soon drifted apart. 

I did not give up on seeing her again, but I wanted her to live for me. I wanted her to live with the baby that would surely be born――.>
